response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $1,100,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its true worth of $1,200,000 and offers you exceptional benefits that align well with your needs and preferences. I believe this offer presents a favorable deal for both parties and would be thrilled to facilitate this transaction if it meets your expectations.", "product_price": 1100000}
